DoneKit Support

Get Support

This page provides support resources and answers to common questions.

Contact

For support inquiries, please email us at:

support@donekit.app

Response time takes 1–3 business days.

Frequently Asked Questions

Tap the "+" button on the main screen, give your space a name, and start adding switches.
Open a checklist item or switch on, and tap the camera icon to take a photo.
Email us at support@donekit.app with a description of the issue and any relevant screenshots. Include your device model, iOS version, and steps to reproduce.
Send your feature suggestions to support@donekit.app. We review all feedback to improve the app.
No, DoneKit does not require an account. Your checklists and photos are available on this device.

Refund

All purchases and refunds are processed directly by Apple. If you need to request a refund, visit Apple's support page and follow the instructions there.

❗

Please note: If Apple rejects your refund request, we're unable to override that decision, as all billing is handled exclusively through their platform.
